post.description: Initiate Activity Search API allows you to initiate an asynchronous search for activities, which is typically the first step in the shopping process. This API also allows you to refine or customize your search by specifying filters.

parameters.name: cnx-sessionid
parameters.description:
unique ID of the user 
 Example : 50c37736-997b-42a9-b038-e64156723dfb

post.description: Get Activity Search Results API allows you to retrieve activity search results based on the search request fields that were provided in the Initiate Activity Search API call, which include a specific location or point of interest, the given guest count (occupants), the stay duration (check-in and check-out dates), and the activity preferences (such as the activity rate, the star rating, and the activity chain) specified. When retrieving the search results, you can specify the pagination preferences and the activity content attributes that you want to retrieve

parameters.name: cnx-sessionid
parameters.description:
unique ID of the user 
 Example : 50c37736-997b-42a9-b038-e64156723dfb

img.cap: Napa and Sonoma Wine Country Full-Day Tour from San Francisco

cnt.smr: Join us on a fun and relaxing Napa Valley Wine Tour with one of our luxury coaches.
cnt.ovw: Their wines have been handcrafted and family owned in Napa Valley for nearly a century
inc: Choose from two departure locations in San Francisco: Fisherman's Wharf or Union Square
exc: Gratuities
Additional food and drinks, unless specified
No Hotel Pick-ups or Drop offs (Pick up from 2 departure zones only)
ofr: Mega Sale with whole family on weekend.
adi: The bus driver was a delight, knowledgeable

opts.des:
Itinerary
This is a typical itinerary for this product

Pass By: San Francisco Bay, San Francisco, CA

San Francisco Bay with its stunning views from the Bay Bridge to the Golden Gate bridge offer the perfect beginning of your journey with Gray Line San Francisco. The infamous prison island Alcatraz is centered in the middle of the bay. A must do while visiting San Francisco. Contact us for tickets!

Pass By: Golden Gate Bridge, US-101, San Francisco, CA 94129

The tour crosses the iconic Golden Gate Bridge.
On a clear day, the Golden Gate Bridge offers a panoramic view of the bay and the San Francisco skyline.

Stop At: B.R. Cohn Winery, 15000 Sonoma Hwy., Glen Ellen, CA 95422

Under the sun in the Valley of the Moon, BR Cohn Winery has been making small lot, vineyard-designated wines since 1984. Nestled between Sonoma Mountain and the Mayacamas Mountain range in scenic Glen Ellen, the winery offers an inviting, relaxed environment for discovering new wine.

Duration: 1 hour 15 minutes

Stop At: Roche Winery, 122 W Spain St Just Off the Northwest Corner of Sonoma Square, Sonoma, CA 95476-5616

Our second stop will bring you to Roche family boutique winery. where they offer over 35 years of award-winning wine making experience, several vineyard designate wines, varietals and blends, as well as their famous down-to-earth Irish hospitality.

The Roche Family welcomes you to visit either our Sonoma winery tasting room where we offer daily barrel tastings, indoor and outdoor wine tasting bars, light bites, and a shaded outdoor tasting patio with fireplaces.

Duration: 1 hour 15 minutes

Stop At: Sonoma Plaza, Spain Street Between First Street East and First Street West, Sonoma, CA

Lunch Time! After all the wine tasting it is necessary to refuel with some unique culinary fare.
The quaint streets are filled with cafes, restaurants and shops with multiple options for your lunch experience.
Remember after lunch there is still another winery to end the day.

Duration: 1 hour 30 minutes

Pass By: Napa Valley, Napa Valley, California

No visit to northern California is complete without a trip to Napa Valley. We take you through the heart of wine country. It is known for hundreds of hillside vineyards, showing off some of the most reknowen and award winning wines of California.

Stop At: Madonna Estate, 5400 Old Sonoma Rd, Napa, CA 94559-9708

Madonna Estate:
Their wines have been handcrafted and family owned in Napa Valley for nearly a century. They are created from 100 percent organically grown grapes, located in the Carneros region of the Napa Valley.
None of the wines available for purchase are found in any retail stores.



Duration: 1 hour

Stop At: Golden Gate Bridge, US-101, San Francisco, CA 94129

On our way back to San Francisco, we will stop at the famous Golden Gate Bridge. This will allow the opportunity to experience this historic structure and see the beauty of the San Francisco Bay. Once you disembark the coach you will have plenty of time to take photos, and enjoy the panoramic views of the San Francisco Bay and San Francisco Skyline.

Duration: 15 minutes

a.n: Napa and Sonoma Wine Country Full-Day Tour from San Francisco

get.description: Search Query API allows you to retrieve search request that were provided in the Initiate Activity Search API call

parameters.name: cnx-sessionid
parameters.description:
unique ID of the user 
 Example : 50c37736-997b-42a9-b038-e64156723dfb

parameters.name: cnx-sessionid
parameters.description:
unique ID of the user 
 Example : 50c37736-997b-42a9-b038-e64156723dfb

tags.name: Details
tags.description: Activity Details API allows you to retrieve activity details based on the activity selected from the response of  Results API call

tags.name: Filters
tags.description: Activity Filters API allows you to retrieve activity Names, Price, Categories, TripAdvisorRating filters to create filtering options

tags.name: Options
tags.description: Activity Options API allows you to retrieve activity options based on the activity Id, activity date and passenger detail selected from the response of Details API call

tags.name: OrderDetails
tags.description: Activity Details API allows you to retrieve activity details based on the activity selected from the response of  Results API call

tags.name: Price
tags.description: Activity Details API allows you to retrieve activity details based on the activity selected from the response of  Results API call

tags.name: Search
tags.description: The Activity Search API allows you to search for activities and retrieve the list of activities around a specific region or point of interest dates, and activity preferences specified. Using this API, you can also specify the customer's point balance and retrieve a list of reward options that the customer can avail to book a activity

tags.name: LatestSearch
tags.description: Activity Latest Search API allows you to retrieve search criteria last used by the user
